Posts.EditableText:
Hi, all!

I have created this simple game as a benchmark for a new library about dynamic rooms. After "Tools|Publish..." I have a nice .quest file that Quest itself can play, of course. But for people who don't have Quest?

Second, you can create a room on the fly. Is it possible to delete a room on the fly also ?

Thanks,

Thierry
Posts.HTML:
Hi, all!

I have created this simple game as a benchmark for a new library about dynamic rooms. After "Tools|Publish..." I have a nice .quest file that Quest itself can play, of course. But for people who don't have Quest?

Second, you can create a room on the fly. Is it possible to delete a room on the fly also ?

Thanks,

Thierry

Posts.EditableText:
Upload your game on this site (click the "Create" tab at the top), and anyone with a web browser can play it.

I assume rooms can be destroyed with the `destroy` command. It takes the name of the room, not the room itself, as an argument, by the way.
Posts.HTML:
Upload your game on this site (click the "Create" tab at the top), and anyone with a web browser can play it.

I assume rooms can be destroyed with the destroy command. It takes the name of the room, not the room itself, as an argument, by the way.
